name: Hoxx VPN Proxy
summary: VPN extension with extension enumeration via chrome.management.getAll(), overly broad externally_connectable allowing ANY web page to message the extension and dispatch Redux actions, error telemetry that collects visited URLs, and opaque WASM-based API client that makes it impossible to fully audit what data is sent to servers.

vulnerabilities.title: Extension Enumeration
vulnerabilities.description: Uses chrome.management.getAll() to enumerate all extensions with proxy permission, storing names in Redux state exposed to UI and external web pages.

vulnerabilities.title: Wildcard externally_connectable
vulnerabilities.description: Declares externally_connectable with matches: ['<all_urls>'], allowing ANY web page to send messages and dispatch Redux actions to the extension.

flags.description: Uses chrome.management.getAll() to enumerate all extensions with proxy permission
Error telemetry collects URLs of pages where network errors occur and sends to Hoxx servers
WASM-based opaque API client handles all request construction/encryption, impossible to fully audit
